Package org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.validation

@Export @Version("1.0.0") package org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.validation
Constraint validators for plugin factory methods.
Since:
2.1

    Constraint
    Meta annotation to mark an annotation as a validation constraint.
